description: Provides information to CodePipeline about new revisions to a source.

parameters.name: pipelineName
parameters.description: The name of the pipeline that starts processing the revision to the source.

parameters.name: stageName
parameters.description: The name of the stage that contains the action that acts on the revision.

parameters.name: actionName
parameters.description: The name of the action that processes the revision.

parameters.name: actionRevision
parameters.description: Represents information about the version (or revision) of an action. The system-generated unique ID that identifies the revision number of the action. The unique identifier of the change that set the state to this revision (for example, a deployment ID or timestamp). The date and time when the most recent version of the action was created, in timestamp format.

nested_params.name: revisionId
nested_params.description: The system-generated unique ID that identifies the revision number of the action.

nested_params.name: revisionChangeId
nested_params.description: The unique identifier of the change that set the state to this revision (for example, a deployment ID or timestamp).

nested_params.name: created
nested_params.description: The date and time when the most recent version of the action was created, in timestamp format.

nested_items.name: newRevision
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the artifact revision was previously used in an execution of the specified pipeline.

nested_items.name: pipelineExecutionId
nested_items.description: The ID of the current workflow state of the pipeline.
